title: Sword and Shadow
description: After generations of exile from their enchanted island home by dark sorcery, the Celae are given a chance to return when twin princes--Prince Rowen the sorcerer and Prince Acaren, the destined ruler--join forces with their soulmates to venture to the forbidden isle to find two mystical swords, Heartfire and Soulshadow, in order to fulfill their destiny. Original.
author: Ann Marston
